sentences.english: How much for the Roast Duck.
Traditional Beijing roast duck is famous all over the world with a hundred years of history.
sentences.chinese: 老北京前门烤鸭名扬四海，至今已有百余年的历史。

sentences.english: I recommend the Quanjude Peking Roast Duck.
sentences.chinese: 我推荐全聚德的北京烤鸭。

sentences.english: Q-Duck? Do you mean the famous roast-duck store?
sentences.chinese: 你指那家著名的烤鸭店吗？

sentences.english: I went to eat BeiJin duck with my colleague.
sentences.chinese: 我今晚跟同事一起去吃北京烤鸭。

sentences.english: Our manager wuld like to invite you to dinner this evening at the Beijing Roast Duck Restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 今晚我们经理想请你们去北京烤鸭店吃饭。

sentences.english: We have roast Peking duck, "Ma por"bean curd, and braised sea cucumber with minced meat.
sentences.chinese: 我们有北京烤鸭，麻婆豆腐和肉末烧海参。

sentences.english: Therefore braise-oven technology of roast duck is considered to be a non-material cultural heritage.
sentences.chinese: 因此，焖炉烤鸭工艺是急需保护的非物质文化遗产。

sentences.english: The roast Beijing duck is delicious. Its skin is really crispy.
sentences.chinese: 北京烤鸭味道极好，烤鸭皮又脆又香。

sentences.english: The roast Beijing duck is delicious. Its skin is really crispy.
sentences.chinese: 北京烤鸭味道极好，烤鸭皮又脆又香。

sentences.english: You have to taste Beijing Roast Duck.
sentences.chinese: 你一定要品尝一下北京烤鸭。

sentences.english: To prepare the duck, chefs go through a lengthy process.
sentences.chinese: 为了制作烤鸭，厨师需要经历漫长的准备过程。

sentences.english: Food Suggestions: Pairs perfectly with red meat, cheeses, sizzling pepper beef and roast duck.
sentences.chinese: 与红肉，干酪，黑椒牛柳和烤鸭堪称绝配。

sentences.english: The roast Peking duck exuded a delicious aroma.
sentences.chinese: 北京烤鸭散发出一股诱人的香味。

sentences.english: Such a handsome profit ought to be a cue to crack open the champagne and roast some Beijing duck.
sentences.chinese: 获得如此高的利润理应喝香槟，吃北京烤鸭庆祝。

definition: shumai (shao mai) steamed dumpling/also written 燒賣|烧卖[shao1 mai4]
Cantonese poached chicken, known as "white cut chicken"
shumai (shao mai) steamed dumpling/also written 燒麥|烧麦[shao1 mai4]
lit. meat wedged in steamed bun/"Chinese burger"/sliced meat sandwich popular in north China
